title: Noam Chomsky Interview
description: Noam Chomsky will co-chair a fundraiser benefiting the San Fernando Valley Refugee Children Center in North Hills, CA which helps unaccompanied minors secure legal and social services.  Noam Chomsky addresses America's immigration crisis.  American philosopher, historian, social critic and political activist Noam Chomsky sits down with journalist Giselle Fernandez to discuss the growing immigration and refugee crisis on the U.S. southern border, the Trump Administration, political propaganda, North Korea, global climate change and American morality in this informative and thought provoking 45-minute interview conducted June 2018 at the University of Arizona, Tucson.
